name: Tower of Hanoi for Game Boy
name_original: Tower of Hanoi for Game Boy
description:
This is the classic math game Tower of Hanoi, implemented on your favorite handheld video game system.

Solve the puzzle while listening to the delightful in-game music and watch the soothing pixel-art scenery.

You can choose the level of difficulty between 3 to 9 levels. There's an optimal solution to each level. Can you play the perfect game?

Recursion is the key!
